response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet your highest standards. Given its unique attributes and the quality it embodies, we believe its fair market value is $1,200,000. Considering its significance and the potential it holds for you, I am extending this exclusive offer at the same price of $1,200,000. We are confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you choose to accept this offer, we assure you of a seamless transaction process and unparalleled customer service. Let's embark on this journey together towards achieving success and excellence.", "product_price": 1200000}
